{{Infobox Radio station |image =| |name = ABC South West WA| |callsign = 6BS| |coordinates = {{Coord|33|19|31.58|S|115|38|06.05|E|type:landmark_scale:2000_region:AU}} |airdate = ? | |frequency = 684 [[kilohertz|kHz]] [[amplitude modulation|AM]]
1044 [[kilohertz|kHz]] [[amplitude modulation|AM]]
738 [[kilohertz|kHz]] [[amplitude modulation|AM]]| |area = [[South West (Western Australia)|South West]]| |owner = [[Australian Broadcasting Corporation]] | |format = [[Talk radio|Talk]] | |website = [http://www.abc.net.au/southwestwa/ http://www.abc.net.au/southwestwa/] | }} '''ABC South West WA''' is an [[ABC Local Radio]] station based in [[Bunbury, Western Australia|Bunbury]]. The station broadcasts to the [[South West (Western Australia)|South West]] region of [[Western Australia]]. This includes the towns of [[Busselton, Western Australia|Busselton]], [[Bridgetown, Western Australia|Bridgetown]], [[Manjimup, Western Australia|Manjimup]] and [[Margaret River, Western Australia|Margaret River]]. The station broadcasts through the following main [[AM Broadcasting|AM]] transmitters, as well as some low power [[FM Broadcasting|FM]] repeaters: *'''6BS''' 684 AM *'''6BR''' 1044 AM *'''6MJ''' 738 AM When local programs are not broadcast the station is a relay of [[ABC South Coast]] and [[720 ABC Perth]]. ==External links== * [http://www.abc.net.au/southwestwa/ ABC South West WA] ==See also== * [[List of Australian radio stations]] {{ABC Local Radio}} [[Category:Radio stations in Western Australia]] {{DEFAULTSORT:Abc South West Wa}}
